reviewText: This has been on my wish list for 4 years! Bill Winston shared this teaching from Jesse in his "No more Toil" message. He had Jesse come to his church in Chicago and preach it there. If you follow Brothers Jesse, Bill, or Kenneth Copeland you will like this teaching. The truth of the power in the born again believer through position as an heir. If you are religious you will probably get mad a few times, but if you are seeking truth you will be empowered and inspired!  I happened to find it on Amazon for a very low price, and in new condition!
